Thunderstruck.name: Legendary Node
Thunderstruck.title: Thunderstruck
Thunderstruck.description: Storm Skills deal increased damage equal to x20% of your Damage vs Close and Damage vs Distant bonuses, up to x60%.

Earthen Devastation.title: Earthen Devastation
Earthen Devastation.description: Your Earth Skills deal x10% increased Critical Strike Damage, increased by x20% of your Damage vs Crowd Controlled bonus, up to x40%.

Survival Instincts.name: Legendary Node
Survival Instincts.title: Survival Instincts
Survival Instincts.description: While in Werebear form, you deal x1% increased damage, up to x60%, for every 1% difference in current Life percent between you and the enemy.

effects: 1% Total Armor while in Werebear Form

Lust for Carnage.name: Legendary Node
Lust for Carnage.title: Lust for Carnage
Lust for Carnage.description: Critical Strikes with Werewolf Skills restore 2 Spirit.

Heightened Malice.name: Legendary Node
Heightened Malice.title: Heightened Malice
Heightened Malice.description: While there are 3 or more Poisoned enemies Nearby, you deal x45% increased damage.

Inner Beast.name: Legendary Node
Inner Beast.title: Inner Beast
Inner Beast.description: After Shapeshifting, your Spirit costs are reduced by 5% for 10 seconds, up to 45%. If you reach 10 stacks, this bonus resets and reduces the Cooldown of your Ultimate Skill by 5 seconds.

Constricting Tendrils.name: Legendary Node
Constricting Tendrils.title: Constricting Tendrils
Constricting Tendrils.description: Lucky Hit: Nature Magic Skills have up to a 15% chance to entangle the enemy with vines, Immobilizing them for 2 seconds and Poisoning them for 150% of the Base damage dealt over 4 seconds.

Ancestral Guidance.name: Legendary Node
Ancestral Guidance.title: Ancestral Guidance
Ancestral Guidance.description: After spending 75 Spirit, you deal x30% increased damage for 5 seconds.

Untamed.name: Legendary Node
Untamed.title: Ancestral Guidance
Untamed.description: After spending 75 Spirit, you deal x30% increased damage for 5 seconds.
